member.summary: Gets or sets the Id of the message.

member.summary: Protocol message returned to a translator if an error occured.

member.summary: Gets the type used by the message.

member.summary: Gets or sets the reason for the failure.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.ExtProtocol.TranslationRequest
member.summary: Protocol message supplied to the external process to indicate a translation is requested.

member.summary: Gets the type used by the message.
